sentence: In early trading on Monday, shares of Boeing topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.3%.
Year to date, Boeing registers a 13.7% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is McDonald's, trading down 1.4%.
McDonald's is showing a gain of 3.7% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are UnitedHealth Group, trading down 1.3%, and Home Depot, trading up 0.8% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
